data.name: Wordle: Determine all possible words that match a pattern
data.description:
Wordle (example of the game [here](https://wordlegame.org/)) is a guessing game where the player is presented with an unknown, 5-letter word that must be guessed in 6 tries.  After each guess the player is given some information about whether each letter was 1) in the right place, 2) in the wrong place, or 3) doesn't exist in the word.

You will be provided a Scrabble dictonary with around 9000 5-letter words.  You can access it in your code with the constant `WORDS`.

The goal is to complete a single function:

1. `possibleWords` - Return an array of all words that match an array of patterns and exclude words with some letters to ignore.

## Attempt patterns

- Upper case letter: right letter, right place
- Lower case letter: right letter, wrong place
- '?': Letter doesn't exist in the word

Example:

```
Secret word: CODER
1st guess: REACT, responds with pattern 're?c?', ignore letters 'AT'
2nd guess: SCORE, responds with pattern '?core', ignore letters 'S'
3rd guess: CORED, responds with pattern 'COrEd', ignore letters ''
```

Each attempt accumulates, so on the 3rd attempt you would pass in:
    
```js
possibleWords(['re?c?', '?core', 'COrEd'], 'ATS')
```

Good luck!  Be sure to try the other challenges, leading up to a full Wordle puzzle solver.
